column4: <G2531>just as</G2531> <G3860>they were handed down</G3860> <G1473>to us</G1473> <G3588>by those who</G3588> <G575>from</G575> <G746>the beginning</G746> <G1096>were</G1096> <G845>eyewitnesses</G845> <G2532>and</G2532> <G5257>servants</G5257> <G3588>of the</G3588> <G3056>word\
<G2443>so that</G2443> <G1921>you may know</G1921> <G3588>the</G3588> <G803>exact truth</G803> <G4012>about</G4012> <G3056>the things</G3056> <G3739>you</G3739> <G2727>have been taught.</G2727>

<G1161>Now</G1161> <G1096>it happened [that]</G1096> <G1722>while</G1722> <G846>he</G846> <G2407>was performing his priestly service</G2407> <G1725>before</G1725> <G2316>God</G2316> <G1722>in</G1722> <G3588>the</G3588> <G5010>[appointed] order</G5010> <G3588>of</G3588> <G846>his</G846> <G2183>division\

column5: </G2405> <G2975>he was chosen by lot</G2975> <G1525>to enter</G1525> <G3588>the</G3588> <G3485>temple</G3485> <G3588>of the</G3588> <G2962>Lord</G2962> <G2370>and burn incense.</G2370>

column4: <G846>“It is he</G846> <G4281>who will go [as a forerunner]</G4281> <G1799>before</G1799> <G846>Him</G846> <G1722>in</G1722> <G4151>the spirit</G4151> <G2532>and</G2532> <G1411>power</G1411> <G2243>of Elijah\
column7: </G1342> <G2090>so as to make ready</G2090> <G2992>a people</G2992> <G2680>prepared</G2680> <G2962>for the Lord.”</G2962>

column5: </G2400> <G1510>you shall be</G1510> <G4623>silent</G4623> <G2532>and</G2532> <G3361>unable</G3361> <G2980>to speak</G2980> <G891>until</G891> <G2250>the day</G2250> <G3739>when</G3739> <G3778>these things</G3778> <G1096>take place\

column4: <G3779>“This is the way</G3779> <G2962>the Lord</G2962> <G4160>has dealt</G4160> <G1473>with me</G1473> <G1722>in</G1722> <G2250>the days</G2250> <G3739>when</G3739> <G1896>He looked [with favor] upon [me]\

column6: </G4771> <G2532>and</G2532> <G1411>the power</G1411> <G5310>of the Most High</G5310> <G1982>will overshadow</G1982> <G4771>you;</G4771> <G2532>and</G2532> <G1352>for that reason</G1352> <G40>the holy</G40> <G1080>Child</G1080> <G2564>shall be called</G2564> <G5207>the Son</G5207> <G2316>of God.</G2316>

column4: <G2532>“And</G2532> <G3107>blessed</G3107> <G4100>[is] she who believed</G4100> <G3754>that</G3754> <G1510>there would be</G1510> <G5050>a fulfillment</G5050> <G2980>of what had been spoken</G2980> <G846>to her</G846> <G3844>by</G3844> <G2962>the Lord.”</G2962>

<G4160>“He has done</G4160> <G2904>mighty deeds</G2904> <G1722>with</G1722> <G846>His</G846> <G1023>arm;</G1023> <G1287>He has scattered</G1287> <G5244>[those who were] proud</G5244> <G1271>in the thoughts</G1271> <G846>of their</G846> <G2588>heart.</G2588>
<G1705>“HE HAS FILLED</G1705> <G3983>THE HUNGRY</G3983> <G18>WITH GOOD THINGS;</G18> <G2532>And</G2532> <G1821>sent away</G1821> <G4147>the rich</G4147> <G2756>empty-handed.</G2756>

<G4040>Her neighbors</G4040> <G2532>and</G2532> <G846>her</G846> <G4773>relatives</G4773> <G191>heard</G191> <G3754>that</G3754> <G2962>the Lord</G2962> <G3170>had displayed</G3170> <G846>His</G846> <G3170>great</G3170> <G1656>mercy</G1656> <G3326>toward</G3326> <G846>her;</G846> <G2532>and</G2532> <G4796>they were rejoicing</G4796> <G846>with her.</G846>

column6: </G3813> <G2564>will be called</G2564> <G4396>the prophet</G4396> <G5310>of the Most High;</G5310> <G1063>For</G1063> <G4313>you will go on</G4313> <G1799>BEFORE</G1799> <G2962>THE LORD</G2962> <G2090>TO PREPARE</G2090> <G846>HIS</G846> <G3598>WAYS;</G3598>

column4: <G1325>To give</G1325> <G846>to His</G846> <G2992>people</G2992> <G1108>[the] knowledge</G1108> <G4991>of salvation</G4991> <G1722>By</G1722> <G859>the forgiveness</G859> <G846>of their</G846> <G266>sins\
<G1161>And</G1161> <G3813>the child</G3813> <G837>continued to grow</G837> <G2532>and</G2532> <G2901>to become strong</G2901> <G4151>in spirit\
